title: ORIGO â€“ Robotics Workshop for Freshers
description: Our flagship annual 2-day workshop where first-year students are introduced to robotics. Participants learn the fundamentals and build their first projects.

title: Workshops for M.Tech Students
description: Every year, our B.Tech members organize and conduct robotics workshops for M.Tech students, sharing practical knowledge and bridging the gap between theory and hands-on application.

title: Tech Talk Series
description: Regular speaker sessions and interactive seminars on robotics, AI, and automation conducted throughout the year with industry professionals and alumni.

title: Robotics Hackathon
description: A high-energy 24-hour hackathon where teams prototype and demo robotics solutions to real-world challenges.

title: Community Outreach
description: Workshops and exhibitions at local schools and colleges to inspire the next generation of engineers and promote robotics awareness.
